About Me

I am currently a freelance data analyst. Sports analytics, particularly for football and basketball (college or pro), are what currently interest me the most, though I am open to any data science projects, big or small. If you want to get in contact with me to discuss one of my blog posts, ask me a question, collaborate on a project, or hire me for consulting work, please reach out to me at mcnealmaxwell@gmail.com.

You can find my github profile here.
